intro: Astrocalyx, commonly known as the star calyx or starflower, is a genus of flowering plants in the family Malvaceae. It is characterized by its showy, star-shaped flowers that typically bloom in shades of pink, red, or white. Astrocalyx species are often cultivated for their ornamental value due to their vibrant and long-lasting blooms.
